name: Gordon Food Service, Inc.
description: Gordon Food Service, Inc. is a leading foodservice distributor in North America, known for its commitment to quality and customer service. Founded in 1897 in Grand Rapids, Michigan, the company has grown from a small grocery store to one of the largest foodservice distributors in the United States and Canada. Gordon Food Service serves a wide range of customers, including restaurants, healthcare facilities, schools, and other institutions, providing them with a diverse selection of products ranging from fresh produce and meats to frozen foods and dry goods. The company prides itself on its ability to provide tailored solutions to meet the unique needs of its customers, supported by a robust logistics network and a dedicated team of professionals. Gordon Food Service also emphasizes sustainability in its operations, focusing on responsible sourcing, waste reduction, and energy-efficient practices. With a strong emphasis on community involvement, the company actively participates in local initiatives and supports food banks and other charitable organizations. Overall, Gordon Food Service remains dedicated to delivering high-quality products and exceptional service while maintaining its core values of integrity, excellence, and teamwork.

seo.meta_title: Gordon Food Service, Inc. | Leading Foodservice Distributor
seo.meta_description: Explore Gordon Food Service, Inc., a top foodservice distributor in North America, offering a wide range of high-quality products and exceptional customer service.

faq.question: What does Gordon Food Service do?
faq.answer: Gordon Food Service is a foodservice distributor that supplies a variety of food products to restaurants, schools, and other institutions.

faq.question: Where is Gordon Food Service headquartered?
faq.answer: Gordon Food Service is headquartered in Grand Rapids, Michigan, USA.

faq.question: When was Gordon Food Service founded?
faq.answer: Gordon Food Service was founded in 1897.

faq.question: What types of products does Gordon Food Service offer?
faq.answer: Gordon Food Service offers fresh foods, frozen foods, and dry goods, including produce, meat, dairy, and canned goods.
